divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were coming home from skateland. As we were aproaching our home I looked up into the sky to see how many stars were out when i noticed a dark triangle object fly across the sky. I only saw it because of the street lights reflecting off the bottom of it. This object had no lights and no sound with it. I just got a new telescope so I have been looking at the stars a lot lately. Luckily I have seen more than stars. This is the second sighting for me here in Tulsa, OK. Last year about this time I was driving and saw a bright light in the sky it stayed in the sky above my car for a few minutes and then took off at an impossible speed and vanished into a tiny dot. It was like watching star trek do warp speed. I never thought I would get to see another one. My son was really excited he looked out the window for a while afterwards. It was definately a thrilling experience. The object would have been to dark for a picture or video to capture I think.
Summary: dark triangle object flew across sky
